name: Protect the Young
description: The children are the future. When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick  result.

name: Survival of the Fittest
description: Survival Limit +1. When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick the lowest result. All newborn survivors gain +1 strength

name: Romantic
description: Survival Limit +1. Believe in the potential for beauty, decency, and ingenuity in others. You may innovate 1 additional time during the settlement phase. In addition, all current and newborn survivors gain +1 understanding.

name: Barbaric
description: Survival Limit +1. Believe in the power of human strength to overpower any obstacle. All current and newborn survivors gain +1 permanent strength.

name: Collective Toil
description: Your settlement leans into the storm. If everyone holds string, you will triumph. At the start of the settlement phase, gain +1(*) for every 10 population.

name: Accept Darkness
description: The settlement no longer fears the darkness. Letting go means your resolve cannot be cracked. Add +2 to all Brain Trauma rolls.

name: Graves
description: All new survivors gain +1 understanding. When a survivor dies during the hunt or showdown phase, gain +2(*). When a survivor dies during the settlement phase, gain +1(*).

name: Cannibalize
description: Survival Limit +1. Whenever a survivor dies, draw 1 basic resource and add it to the settlement storage.
